entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
